connection_config.title: Egnyte Domain
connection_config.description: The subdomain of your Egnyte account

notes: Uses PKCE (S256). API key format is client_id:client_secret for x-api-key header.
When creating your application, make sure to select `Authentication Only` as the connection type.

connection_config.title: Domain Extension
connection_config.description: The domain extension of your Exact Online account

notes: Production applications cannot use localhost URLs to sign in with Facebook. You need to use a dedicated development application in Facebook to use localhost callback URLs.
Grant type: Authorization Code Scopes to have basic infos (email, nickname, guid and avatar) : openid, email, profile
Uses Application ID as client_id and Secret ID as client_secret. Token request uses JSON body format.

connection_config.title: Issuer URL
connection_config.description: Your Frontegg issuer URL (e.g., https://app-abc123.frontegg.com)

notes: Use access_type=offline to receive a refresh_token. PKCE and state checks recommended.

connection_config.description: The subdomain of your Gorgias account

connection_config.title: User Agent
connection_config.description: The user agent of your custom app

notes: Not free. Obtain a Client ID from Valve via Steamworks: https://partner.steamgames.com/doc/webapi_overview/oauth
Uses Stripe Connect OAuth. Client credentials sent in request body.
Token endpoint is on different domain (swd.weatherflow.com) than authorization (tempestwx.com).
Email address is not returned by the Threads API.

Production applications cannot use localhost URLs to sign in with TikTok. You need add the domain and Callback/Redirect urls to your TikTok app and have them review and approved by the TikTok Team. If you need to test your implementation, you can use the sandbox feature and ngrok for testing in localhost.
